title: FS:  SOLD  T3 Turkey Red Home Run Baker SGC 60--One of Toughest
author: GregMitch34

posts.post_title: FS:  SOLD  T3 Turkey Red Home Run Baker SGC 60--One of Toughest
posts.post_content:
One of very hardest to find in any "5" or above, as reflected in last night's record PWCC price for a PSA 5 of over $1900.   Now I realize the SGC's are not valued as much and no guarantee of crossover (you be the judge) hence my price of $1428, pp friends and family.  Thanks. 
[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=272408&stc=1&d=1494254865[/url]

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=272409&stc=1&d=1494254865[/url]
The T3 of Baker is actually Jack Barry who played with "Home Run" in the A's million dollar infield.

[quote name="Yoda" post=1661890]The T3 of Baker is actually Jack Barry who played with "Home Run" in the A's million dollar infield.[/QUOTE]



How 'bout that!


I never noticed that.


- long before Aurelio Rodriguez and Gary Pettis had the bat boys pose in their places.


Great Pickup, Greg !


.
